## Import.ImportContext.extend() method

Extends the import context with additional name segments and conditions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
extend(context?: IValidatedImportContext): Result<ImportContext>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

[IValidatedImportContext](./ts-res.import.ivalidatedimportcontext.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The [import context](./ts-res.import.iimportcontext.md) to extend this context with.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ImportContext](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a new [import context](./ts-res.import.importcontext.md) containing the extended context if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if the operation fails.
